attributes.action: Legalise pepper spray in the UK to protect vulnerable people.
attributes.additional_details: To protect vulnerable people- young women especially against predators and criminals who are a danger to them and society. Illegal weapons are still scarily common in society and legalising pepper spray would allow the public to be able to temporarily defend themselves.
attributes.background: Legalise pepper spray for people of a certain age.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Give civilians the right to carry non-lethal self-defence weapons.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333686
